title: OceanNetwork
author: OceanNetwork
content: Make decentralized trading fast and reliable with Ocean Network, which aims to benefit the Binance Smart Chain, Ethereum, Avalance, Polygon and Arbitrum ecosystem.ocn.network | dapp.ocn.network | docs.ocn.networkOcean Network EcosystemWelcome to the Ocean Network ecosystem. Explore our DApp programs developed to take decentralized commerce to the next level. Try our Sea DApp platform, designed for many blockchains, for free!Multi-Chain DAppSea DApp has been created with multi-chain support, and utility programs are designed to access chain ecosystems.Ocean WalletOcean Wallet is a Telegram Bot created on Telegram social media platform. Telegram users can create a new Web3 wallet using the Ocean Wallet Bot and freely manage their respective wallets on the Telegram platform in a secure and decentralized manner.Ocean Wallet was created using the Sea DApp infrastructure. Visitors and users can connect to the Sea DApp platform using their Ocean Wallet account. It is a unique method to bring decentralized trading to the Telegram platform.https://t.me/OceanWalletBotForce Trade APIPerform all your decentralized trading transactions in the fastest way without paying commissions! Buy early and sell at the exact profit point you want without slippage problems. Meet decentralized and unlimited trading.Ocean Network makes its decentralized trading software open source for developers. Web3, bot, DApp and similar software developers can create and develop their personal programs using Ocean Network software. Please review the related documents for API Usage.https://docs.ocn.network/developers/get-started
